name: No Time to Relax - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The smooth and cozy soundtrack from No Time to Relax


This is the official No Time to Relax soundtrack. No longer must you keep No Time to Relax open to listen to its tunes. These are all the current tracks in the game plus our trailer track. If any new tracks are added to the game in the future they too will be added to this soundtrack.

No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 01 (2:55)
No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 02 (2:48)
No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 03 (1:53)
No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 04 (2:48)
No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 05 (2:48)
No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 06 (2:21)
No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 07 (2:24)
No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 08 (2:07)
No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 09 (2:07)
No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 10 (2:28)
No Time to Relax (Original Soundtrack) - 11 (1:25)

All tracks are on .mp3 and lossless .flac formats.
All tracks were composed and produced by Eiður Steindórsson.

After you download this soundtrack you can listen to it through the Steam music player or freely add them to any of your favorite music apps.
